items.intro:
We spent a decade building chain silos. Now it's time to break them down.

items.welcome-donut:
## Donut Testnet ğŸ©

Donut is Push Chainâ€™s public testnet for Universal Apps that work across chains. It is a major mileston in bringing universal apps to the masses.

![Push Chain Roadmap](/assets/website/chain/knowledge/testnet/image-1.webp)
items.what-is-push-chain:
## What is Push Chain?

Push Chain is a shared-state, universal blockchain where **interoperability is a core chain primitive**, not an afterthought added through external protocols. **Deploy once**, and your app runs natively across connected chains.

**Donut is where we battle-test that.**

items.donut-roadmap:
## Donut Testnet ğŸ©

Donut is Push Chainâ€™s public testnet for Universal Apps that work across chains.

**What is Push Chain?**

Push Chain is a shared-state, universal blockchain where **interoperability is a core chain primitive**, not an afterthought added through external protocols. **Deploy once**, and your app runs natively across connected chains. Donut is where we battle-test that.

Here's how we got here, and what comes next!

![Push Chain Roadmap](/assets/website/chain/knowledge/testnet/image-1.webp)

The roadmap outlines Push Chain's journey from universal core features to full cross-chain execution and mainnet readiness.

Donut brings the full Push ecosystem online with:

* ğŸŒ³ **Ecosystem Apps:** Explore live Universal Apps on the [Ecosystem Page](https://push.org/ecosystem).
* **ğŸ“– Developer Docs:** Start building Universal Apps at [push.org/docs](https://push.org/docs).
* **ğŸ§  Knowledge Base:** Learn the architecture and design at [push.org/knowledge](https://push.org/knowledge).
* **ğŸª© Popular Apps to Try:**
  * [Ballsy](https://ballsy.push.org/) â€” experience the same app logic working seamlessly across chains.
  * [Simulate](https://simulate.push.org/) â€” test and visualize cross-chain interactions.
* **ğŸ’§ Faucet:** Get testnet tokens at [faucet.push.org](https://faucet.push.org).
* **ğŸ” Donut Scan:** Track transactions and network data at [donut.push.network](https://donut.push.network/).
items.why-push-exists:
## Why Push Chain Exists

Today's Web3 ecosystem is heavily fragmented and overly complex.

Developers redeploy smart contracts across multiple chains, users have to manually bridge tokens or switch wallets, and teams spend months maintaining chain-specific codebases and audits.

Each new chain adds overhead, complexity, cost and friction, which massively slows innovation and adoption.

**Push Chain eliminates this.**
items.how-reimagines-interoperability:
## Chain-native Interop

Most interoperability today relies on external messaging layers or bridges. You manage multiple contracts, audits, and integrations across every chain.

**Push Chain flips that model.** With Push, you:

* **Deploy once, reach everywhere.** Your app instantly becomes available across chains, EVM or non-EVM.
* **Drop redundant contracts and bridges.** Interoperability is native to the chain, so you focus on your app, not infrastructure.
* **Stay fully EVM-compatible.** Use the same tooling, frameworks, and audits you already have.
* **Serve users from any chain or wallet.** Users transact from their home chain using existing wallet. No manual bridging, no gas tokens, no network switching, no swapping, no setup.
items.how-to-participate:
## How do I Participate in the Network?

### ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ’» Developers

Push Chain gives developers the power to **build once and deploy everywhere.**

Every **app runs natively** across all chains without extra integrations or separate deployments.

The chain currently supports **Ethereum, Solana, Base, Arbitrum, and BNB Chain** on testnet, with more chains coming soon.

Start building your first Universal App:

* Explore the [Documentation](https://push.org/docs)
  Interact with live codeboxes, examples right from the docs.
* Play around with [Ballsy App](https://ballsy.push.org)
  Experience a Universal App in action. No wallet, gas juggling or setup required.
* Apply for ğŸŒ±[Grassroot Program](https://zv9atndluia.typeform.com/to/ItQ7i2sO)
  We are a developer-first chain. Want to take your app to the next level? Have persistence and passion? Apply to be included in our Grassroot Program and scale your app to reach every user.

### ğŸŒUsers

Experience a Web3 that just works: No switching chains, bridging tokens, or learning required.

Use your existing wallet to access any app on Push Chain and pay directly in your native token.

* Try Universal Apps on our ğŸŒ³[Ecosystem Page](https://push.org/ecosystem)
* Check activity of Donut Testnet on [Push Explorer](https://donut.push.network)

### ğŸ§‘â€ğŸš€ Node Operators

Push Chain's network is powered by a decentralized set of validators.

To run a validator, execute the following command on Mac or Ubuntu:

`curl -fsSL https://get.push.network/node/install.sh | bash`

To understand the different configs and what everything means, check out [Running Push Validator](https://push.org/docs/chain/node-and-system-tools/running-push-validator/).

Why run a testnet validator?

Running a testnet validator helps strengthen the network and shape its mainnet readiness. It may also include perks and benefits that will come with Season 3 of [Push Points Program](https://portal.push.org).

Tag [@pushchain](https://x.com/PushChain) and share your experience with us on X.
